statements: SELECT * FROM email_drip_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, is_active FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_id, user_id FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM email_drip_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, campaign_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_drip_campaigns ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, is_active FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE end_date IS NULL ORDER BY campaign_id DESC
SELECT user_id, campaign_name FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE is_active = FALSE ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT * FROM email_drip_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT user_id, name, subscription_date FROM users ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, name, country FROM users WHERE subscription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, country, subscription_date FROM users WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY subscription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT name, country FROM users WHERE subscription_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, country, subscription_date FROM users WHERE country != 'Canada' ORDER BY subscription_date ASC;
SELECT users.name, user_actions.action_type, user_actions.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN user_actions ON users.user_id = user_actions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, preferences->>'theme' as theme_preference FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, count(*) as total_events FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_events > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, send_datetime FROM email_campaigns WHERE send_datetime > NOW() ORDER BY send_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM user_behavior GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_content, send_datetime FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY send_datetime DESC;
SELECT u.name, e.event_type, e.event_timestamp FROM users u INNER JOIN user_behavior e ON u.user_id = e.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, send_emails FROM user_preferences WHERE email_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT u.*, ua.activity_type, ua.timestamp FROM users u JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, up.send_emails FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id WHERE up.send_emails = true
SELECT ut.template_name, ut.template_content FROM email_templates ut
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT last_login, user_id FROM users ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, campaign_id, user_id, log_timestamp FROM campaign_logs WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email, name, last_login FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, name, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT users.name, user_events.event_name, user_events.event_timestamp FROM users JOIN user_events ON users.user_id = user_events.user_id;
SELECT user_id, email_frequency FROM user_preferences WHERE receive_emails = true;

SELECT campaign_logs.log_id, email_templates.template_name, users.name, campaign_logs.log_timestamp FROM campaign_logs JOIN email_templates ON campaign_logs.campaign_id = email_templates.template_id JOIN users ON campaign_logs.user_id = users.user_id;
